availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hamilton S. Brooking (Mason County, farmer and constable)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer and constable. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Hill Brooking in Mason County, Kentucky, on March 2, 1840 . Father of Leonidas M. Brooking, Abner N. Brooking, Nathan V. Brooking, John J. Brooking, Nancy Brooking, and Charles Brooking. Constable in Bracken County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 400A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 65.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond Kentucky, Mason County, Film #000281843, p. 266.
Elizabeth Prather Ellsberry, Cemetery Records Mason County, Kentucky, Vol. I (Chillicothe, MO, c1965).
